item.title: PUBG Mobile Latest 1.3 Update
item.author: team gagetin
item.content:encoded:
PUBG Mobile Latest 1.3 Update

iais nokia's new budget 4G Andrr

Brandon Diamond Brandon is a avid zombie hunter.
December 11th, 4:44 PM

NAndroid smartphone. It released in India on 26 November 2020. it priced at 10399* and will compete against Oppo A5, Realme Narzo 20A and Realme c12. The Nokia 2.4 comes with 6.5 inch HD+ IPS LCD display powered by MediaTwk Helio P22 processor it has 3GB RAM and 64 GB internal memory and 4500mAh battery. The main attractive feature is it comes with stock android, so no need to worry about unwanted applications and Nokia also promises for 2 years android upgrades and 3 years of security upgrades. so may be you will get updations from android 10 to 11 or 12 or 13. The Nokia 2.4 is well shaped, feel good to carry the mobile phone. the back side of Nokia 2.4 is made with polycarbonate shell it also feels comfortable and scrach resistant. It has a dedicated Google assistant key on left with 3.5 audio jack micro usb port. There are three colors avilable for customers Dusk, Charcoal and Fjord. People will love the Dual sim card plus micro Sd card reader slot facility. External MicroSD card supports up to 512 GB. Let's talk about dimensions, it has 165.85mm height, 76.30mm width, 8.69mm of thickness and 189g of weight. 13MP plus 2MP rear camara and 5 MP front camera as good as the segment. it also provide FM radio. The outdated 5V charger and old processor sometimes make you feel angry. The Nokia 2.4 is ideal for someone who needs large display for day today requirements.

item.title: Noise Air buds mini launched as budget range ear buds
item.author: team gagetin
item.description: IQOO introduce their new 5G Smartphone .The cenarih OS 11.1.
item.content:encoded:
Noise Air buds mini launched as budget range ear buds

iais nokia's new budget 4G Android smartpr

Brandon Diamond Brandon is a avid zombie hunter.
December 11th, 4:44 PM

IQOO introduce their new ne IQOO 7.The new design is stylish and stunning; IQOO 7 is definitely the best flagship device in the segment. The device focused on all-round performance. The device has carries aggregation that means you can get 4G+. The processor is Qualcomm Snapdragon 870. This blazing fast processor features a 7nm chipset with A77 architecture and enhanced UFS 3.1 storage and it has intelligent display chip, extended ram, 4D game vibration and largest graphite layers. The 12 Hz AMOLED display with 1300nits peak brightness ensures a smooth and seamless viewing experience. IQOO 7 has a 66W Flash Charger. It is fastest in the segment, it can charge the 4400mAh battery zero to hundred in 30 minutes and the device has surround sound with dual speakers; it brings the true audio-visual experience to hi-fi enthusiasts. The Main camera of IQOO 7 is 48 MP with sony IMX598 sensor. It provides superior results in night and motion scenarios. It also has 12 MP cameras for ultra wide angle, a 2 MP mono camera. The device has 12GB ram and 156 GB storage and android 11 based operating system with Funtouch OS 11.1.
